properties.sql:
SELECT p.id as idProc, dp.c_nome_banco as Banco, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, 
sp.Id AS processId, sp.Name AS processName, sact.Id AS instanceId, sact.Name AS activityName, p.dateCreated, 
sact.Id AS ActivityId
FROM shkprocesses sp 
LEFT JOIN shkprocesses sp2 on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = sp2.Id 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo 
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State 
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id 
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN  SHKAssignmentsTable sass on sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running' AND p.id is not null AND (ssta.oid = '1000001' OR ssta.oid = '1000003' OR ssta.oid = '1000005')
AND sp.id LIKE '%CH%'
AND sass.ResourceId LIKE "%reiniciar_geral%"
